text.section: With the approval of the commissioner, the department may exempt insurers, employer-organized associations that self-insure, and health purchasing outlets from the data reporting requirements of this section if the total number of insureds is less than five hundred (500).

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1225, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 5, effective July 13, 2004. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 521, sec. 3, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 496, sec. 41, effective April 10, 1998.
